objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGrad' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F5EFE8'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E8D5C0'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D4AF37' stop-opacity='0.7'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#D4AF37' stop-opacity='0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='white' stroke='#E8D5C0' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='820' cy='400' r='130' fill='url(#accentGrad)'/><g opacity='0.3'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='10' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='700' cy='800' r='20' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='300' cy='900' r='15' fill='#D4AF37'/></g><path d='M150 350 Q 300 250, 450 350' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M630 830 Q 780 930, 930 830' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M190 750 L 250 810' stroke='#C9A887' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M830 270 L 890 330' stroke='#C9A887' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/></svg>

objects.text: • Durable Faux Leather • Spacious Design • Gold Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner showcases a luxury handbag designed for a premium fashion brand. At the center is a prominently displayed product image surrounded by a soft, circular white frame over a beige radial gradient background. The banner features a bold header (`heading`) and a sleek subheading (`subheading`) placed at the top for branding emphasis. A rich price tag element (`price`) overlays a golden circular accent, guiding attention to the product cost. Supporting product features are listed below the image using the `description` text layer. A gold rectangular call-to-action button (`cta`) sits near the bottom overlaying `cta_background`, encouraging immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige (#F5EFE8)
- Dusty Peach (#E8D5C0)
- Rich Brown (#573D29)
- Deep Brown (#2D2016)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish handbag in a soft camel brown tone (#B88B6A), which serves as the primary color, giving an earthy, elegant appeal. The texture adds depth while maintaining a matte finish. Accents of polished gold (#D4AF37) used in the metal hardware, logo, and decorative charms provide a luxurious contrast that catches the eye. The subtle blend of muted brown with radiant gold highlights elevates the sophistication of the bag. For an advertisement banner, a complementary color palette of camel brown (#B88B6A), gold (#D4AF37), ivory (#F5F5F5), and deep taupe gray (#5B4C43) would enhance product focus while maintaining a chic aesthetic.
